title: Atos
description: Atos is a global leader in digital transformation with a strong brand identity reflected through a vibrant palette. The primary colors include deep blue (#0066A1) and charcoal black (#231F20), conveying trust and sophistication. Complementary colors like silver gray (#BFBFBF) and ocean teal (#00B2A9) add a modern touch, while rich purple (#A626AA), indigo (#6639B7), and vivid orange (#FF6319) create an energetic and innovative image. These colors are sourced from the official Atos branding guide, accessible online.
